title: My game summary screen takes 30 sec or more too load in the beta client.
body:
I have been using the beta client for awhile now, and ever since the 7.6 patch, my game summary screen after a game takes 30+ sec to load. I can use the legacy client and the summary screen pops up immediately. I have tried my best to troubleshoot this on my own but I am not very tech savvy. Any help on this matter would be greatly appreciated. In the mean time i will just use the legacy client


P.S. I tried uninstalling and re-installing and this did not fix the issue. I also tried running a full repair in the settings. Nothing has worked so far.

replies.body: connection tool does not fix the problem did absolutely nothing to make game summary load any faster.  Let me know if you get an answer though because it's dumb loading into an after game lobby after everyone has left.....

i feel stupid but i had the close client during game box marked in the settings. That makes loading the summary page take longer because it has to reconnect to the client. That was my issue. not sure if you have the same the problem or not.

When your game ends, your network needs to transition from the game server and back to pvp.net.   Your network settings might configured properly with the legacy client, but might be running into hiccups with the new one.  Just in case, I suggest going over the steps found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot any bumps along the way.  Let me know if it helps.
